desc: Explore our signature Napa Valley essentials, from wine county picnic baskets and branded water bottles, to stylish blankets and our popular Boon Fly Café mugs.

layout.text: Welcome to Carneros Resort and Spa's online store. Explore our Napa Valley essentials, from wine county picnic baskets and water bottles, to stylish blankets and our popular Boon Fly Café mugs. Items can be shipped anywhere in the U.S., or are available for pick-up at the Market.
